name: High-Protein Power Bowl
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
steps:
Rinse quinoa and cook in broth according to package instructions (about 15-20 minutes). Fluff and let cool.
Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, cumin, chili powder, and garlic powder.
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 165Â°F.
Remove chicken from heat, let rest for 5 minutes, then slice into strips.
Drain and rinse black beans thoroughly.
Prepare vegetables: halve tomatoes, slice red onion, dice avocado.
In a small bowl, mix Greek yogurt with lemon juice, salt, and pepper to create a creamy dressing.
To assemble bowls: Start with a base of quinoa in each bowl.
Add fresh spinach leaves on top of quinoa.
Arrange chicken strips, black beans, tomatoes, and red onion around the bowl.
Place diced avocado on top.
Drizzle with remaining olive oil and the Greek yogurt dressing.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately.
